enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
sentences: SBI Chair Becker introduced this item (FCCC/SBI/2005/10 annex I).

The PHILIPPINES said the SCCF was to address urgent needs of developing countries since the operating entity of the financial mechanism cannot adequately do so. COLOMBIA said that SCCF must consist of new and additional funding rather than have ODA channeled through it.
The EU stated that activities under the SCCF and Adaptation Fund should not overlap.
Bubu Pateh Jallow (Gambia) will chair a contact group.
